name: Tara Flowers
text: They still have beautiful flowers for sale. Very few Bonnie plants. They also have plenty of seeds but if you are looking for collards or turnips look elsewhere.

name: James “Jay” Casey
text: Looking for great plants for your garden this summer?  Home Depot at Crestwood Festival Center even has heirloom varieties of tomato plants you will not find other places.

name: Clarence Slaght
text: Good people and good place to load

name: Scott L
text: Other than being a soup bowl (very wet and muddy), great place.

name: Throttlebuff
text: Awesome for letting us do what we do.  Thanks for the no hassles!  BRAAAAAAP!

name: TheLordkreaver
text: Good service

name: C Taylor
text: Helpful and knowledgeable employees. I have been here often. I actually pass up another improvement store to come to this one. Always have what I need and if they don't they will direct me where to go. The first time I came to this store was when we first moved to an area 35 miles from this store. I needed a Christmas tree. The Christmas trees were having a tuff year because of the drought. They replace the tree with a bigger one because I had to drive so far to come back. Super nice folks. I will continue to drive here for my home improvement needs.

name: Tracy Wyatt
text: Helpful people wonderful place to shop and they care about vets only one thing i have a promblem with is the garden center their plants are not taken care of and the empl oyees are familar with plants.

name: Mark Singleton
text: Found everything I needed except hosta plants

name: Shahari Pierce
text: They always have a great selection of plants and flowers. The deals aren't bad. I do wish they would take better care of the clearance section. When I go, a lot of them are usually knocked over and in dire need of water.

name: Maxine Bailey
text: Nice plants, plenty of seeds on display. Didn't find fingerling potatoes. Guess their spring supply of flowers will be in soon.

name: BYRDIE Yeah
text: They not only did not have what i wanted in stock. but they also had a sales agent in the garden center who absolutely had no knowledge about plants whatsoever. Nor was she willing to get off of her lazy ass to help a customer look either. She just sat there at the register and pointed to a section where she think it might be and began to say how they had them last week but dont know what is or isnt there now. Im like: uhh but you work here and you dont know what you have in stock of the main area where you work..smh

name: Teresa Davis
text: Great place to shop excellent customer service

name: Mary Reese
text: Nice, good prices

name: jamacia rudolph
text: Awesome flowers

name: Kelly Ingram
text: I highly recommend  Bubba’s for all your landscaping needs.  They helped me design and select all the materials that I needed for several different outdoor projects. Delivery was timely and the workers were great. I am 110% satisfied with their service. I look forward to doing business with them again.

name: honakerm
text: I really appreciated the service and advice provided by the folks at Bubba's.  I had an issue with a very low carport and they had the right size truck to get under my 7'6" structure.  I also discovered they provide site prep work as well, so I'll be interested in their quote.

name: Hilda Mckee
text: I am outragged with this company. They were very timely only to tear my chain link fence up and state he was not going to replace it. The driver backed into the backyard lifting the tail of the dump truck and pulled up to do a second dump. He then cut the wheel and took the side of my fence down. He finished dumping the load and left making me think if I called the owner they'd replace my fence. Only to find out he was not. The parts for the fence were $58. It took me and my husband two days to put the fence back. I would not recommend this company to pour rocks on my grave!!!!! It isn't about the money it's the principle. Bubba's Material ruined my fence and I hope you think twice before choosing this company. They just tear your stuff up,  get your money, and leave. A very poor way to do business.

name: David Bush
text: These people are so nice that I will only order from them. Price is great and they do a good job dumping the sand where I needed it. Really happy with the service.

name: tony clay
text: Friendly knowledgeable service our prices have doubled since I last used about 10 years ago

name: christopher harris
text: Very helpful staff. Good folks.

name: John Strange
text: Good dirt good price nice people

name: James Linch
text: Best place in tri county area to get your materials delivered or picked up

name: Jerrod Jackson
text: They have very good material. and they deliver.

name: Jimmy Edwards
text: Great service and friendly people.

name: Lisle and Jessica Babcock
text: Great staff, fantastic prices, and they deliver if needed.

name: Donna Dannelly
text: Nice friendly people,  welcoming lobby

name: Roy Franks
text: Pretty good place, I’d recommend buying from them for your bulk material needs, prices are very fair.

name: carlos rogers
text: Great customer service. You get more for your money. I have bought from Bubba's materials four times. I was also tasked with a huge project at work. I based my bill of materials off of Bubba's prices. The price was so good until the boss wanted to double the size of the project. Hands down they beat the other supplier in town any day. I live within three miles of that supplier but even with delivery bubba does better

name: S L
text: These guys are always awesome to work with! Great pine bark fines for gritty and 511 soilless mix!

name: Kay Duarte
text: Very helpful.  Reasonable prices for materials and delivery.

name: Theresa Keel
text: They have a great selection of rocks, gravel, dirt, and soil. They have or csn acquire rocks in various colors. Yhey are helpful and friendly and provide great service. The place is neat and organized.

name: Cathee Gipson
text: We are thrilled with our new recycled asphalt driveway!  Our phone calls were answered promptly, our quote was delivered quickly, the project began on the date promised, and the quality of the work was better than we ever imagined possible.  Thanks so much to Superintendent Chico and his driver, Chris, for a job well done!

name: Kevin Mccord
text: Very good people came out on short notice and was very fair on the price.

name: Jongira
text: They've added mulch to the stone yard ! Good selection, front desk was very helpful . You can find fossils and some of the stones!

name: Leah Brownell
text: My family and I have used this business for over 10 years and have been impressed every single time!! The service is phenomenal and products are extremely high quality. We will never use any other business!!

name: peter dorough
text: Great folks, prompt service, community minded

name: Austin Rametta
text: Charles is the man! A real family-type establishment. Can't wait to bring my son with me next time so he can check it out too.

name: Deborah Dias
text: Customer service is A1 and they go out their way to make the delivery a helpful experience.

name: bridget gonzalez
text: These guys are so nice. They helped us get some super soil for our garden and the price was great!

name: Joey hall
text: Bubba's did an awesome job on my driveway.I would definitely recommend them for any of your dirt or rock moving projects. I will be using their services again

resp.text: Thanks for the review. We appreciate your business

name: TJ Amadore
text: Excellent service and prices!

name: Landyn Clark
text: The people at Bubbas have always made me feel like family and my experience has always been exceptional!!! You will be satisfied, I promise!

name: Van W Beasley
text: Good people, fair pricing, excellent customer service

name: Megan Cromwell
text: Excellent customer service. Bubba's is the BEST in the river region! Give them a call!

name: Michael Sexton
text: I ordered load of topsoil. Was supposed to be screened topsoil but it had gravel big as quarters, hard clay chunks big as half dollars and bigger, sticks 3 to 6 in long and big around as your finger . everywhere I spread it big tall weeds spouted. They were the cheapest in price but as they say you get what you pay for. I'll not be ordering any more from them and wouldn't  recommend them to anyone.

resp.text: While we appreciate your review, we have no record of ever hauling to you. If you can provide us with a receipt of purchase, we will gladly make good on your order as we stand behind our products. Thanks!

name: Caroline LaMothe
text: Super friendly and helpful for any of your landscape material needs from rock, sand, gravel, ect.  They even have sample jars in the office so you can see exactly what you are getting.

name: Britni Lambert
text: Great customer service! Friendly staff. All around great establishment!

name: gustavius Maxie
text: Great people to deal with

name: Pj Walker
text: They give u timely service and they have low prices and they have friendly drivers and they can drive lol

name: Brittney Clark
text: Will never use anyone other than Bubba's! Greatest experience you'll ever have!

name: Tristin Gish
text: Great place good people great prices

name: Addie Phillips
text: The best pick up in town! I call Bubba's everytime I'm in need of a hoe, and they always do my dirty work!

name: Racheal Boles
text: Great customer service and our rocks were delivered the same day we ordered! 👍🏻

name: Cassy Gillman
text: Great company, great people! Can't go wrong with Bubba's!!

name: Mary Now
text: Great service!! Alan is always happy to help!!!  Did an amazing job on my driveway!!!!

name: Shelby Pope
text: They did an awesome job on our driveway!

name: John Skaggs
text: Very friendly, helpful to my business.

name: Annalyse Hofstra
text: Friendly people!! Always satisfied

name: Derek Carmichael
text: Same day delivery! Awesome customer service!!!

name: Nikki Caldwell
text: Good dirt and awesome people!!! 😊

name: Katherine Hilley
text: Nothing beats a family oriented business like Bubbas!

name: Kimberley Baudanza
text: great customer service!

name: Camdyn Carmichael
text: Awesome company!!! Charles is amazing!

name: Jincheol Woo
text: Goood...

name: Amanda Ledyard
text: Great service!

name: Kevin Kirby
text: Friendly and honest

name: Chris Fraley
text: Very expensive

resp.text: Chris, we are so sorry that you felt that our prices were high. We find that we are very competitive to our competitors. If you need anything in the future, we'd be happy to help :)

name: Samantha Hopkins
text: Going inside  the gardening center my first impression  was  the plants on the outside were not listed properly, several  perennial were under annuals and one plant had a arm of ants in it, next the stepping stones were very limited, I was looking for the octagon shaped one no luck, and the two hump barrier stone for flower beds were only in red which is disappointing, some of the plants were a little high considering the condition, also I'd love to know the name of some that happen to be in a planter assortment, left  me wondering.  I didn't like that some were very little detail on the information label but we do have Google  so I can't  complain too much. The cashiers seem to runaway if a customer comes to pay it was very unprofessional and also a waste of my time having to go find both cashiers "helping" customer, one literally was just watching.

name: Kyndall Reynolds
text: The garden center attendant was very knowledgeable of the products and helpful in us choosing a zero turn mower, bagger, and tiller.

name: Barry “Baw” Williams Sr.
text: Awesome!very helpful workers who can help you and know what they talking about too!

name: SandiB
text: Bought a new lawn mower on sale. Was $249 on sale for $186. Troybilt

name: Lora Benson
text:
Cashier was very courteous to her own kind.
Let some guy that just walked up go before me in line. Never ask how I was today like the other patrons whom she had full conversation with. But I did ask her how she was. No-one to help load or unload. All common for this location. Makes you want to drive 10 miles out of the way to Lowes.

name: Juanvinetta Elliott
text: Didn't  have everything I needed but I did get somethings

name: Paul Burnette
text: They didn't have the part that I was trying to find.....

name: Robert Turner Sr
text: Everything were nice and clean. Everyone we're frendly, speaking, wanting to help.as usually. Thanks.

name: elonzo taylor
text: Very neat...found what I was looking for with no problem.

name: Steven Dillon
text: Had what I needed and great price

name: Ron Terry
text: Nice place to visit

name: ohms0704
text: Good

name: Amanda Kidney
text:
Bought my decorative egg rock from them. It turned out beautiful.
Bought sod from them, it thrived.
Thought I'd save $25 on my next sod purchase and bought from another supplier in Mobile,  I regret it. The other sod I got is sickly and struggling, the pieces were falling apart as we tried to lay them.
The extra $25 per pallet is well worth it at woerner for healthy and thriving sod. (Centipede)

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and do hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Johnny Williams
text: Very well stocked. The staff was extremely helpful. I will be back for sure.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Chad kiper
text: Great products. Friendly employees. A+

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Pamela Waleri
text: Monday delivery. Very good company to work with.

name: Andrew Carstarphen
text: Great service firm the guy that loaded my car with the items I purchased

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad we were able to help and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Ivan Martinez
text: Beat place to get sod in the area and they offer military discount!

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. Customer service is a top priority for Woerner - we are glad you had a great experience and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Kim
text: Always a-1 service with smiles...always enjoy my trips there.

resp.text: Thank you for your 5-star review. We are so happy that we made your experience at our store a good one, customer service is a top priority for Woerner Turf. We hope you visit us again soon!

name: B C
text: Built a deck and walkway at my house last fall. David and the crew in Mobile helped with materials and advice. I got a great deal on some cut stone, sand, gravel, dirt, beach pebbles, and sod. Planted a flower bed in a galvanized trough and used the gravel for drainage. Built the walkway with the cut stone and used the beach pebble around some of the bushes. The grass took some time since I planted it in the fall, but it came out great in the spring. I will definitely be back for my next DIY project.

resp.text: Thanks for the detailed review, B C!

name: Michael Thompson
text: I’m a concrete contractor that uses these guys from time to time. They are a bit expensive, but I don’t mind paying for good service and quality products. We have purchased gravel, wall blocks, pavers and stones from them in the past. I always recommend them to customers for any of their personal landscaping needs. I went in to purchase some pea gravel and when I reminded the girl at the front desk that I should get contractor price, she was extremely rude. I probably would have went ahead and got an account, but she was so rude and disrespectful I never had a chance. Her name is Carla and I suggest someone in management teach her manners. I’ll use other stores for my products and not recommend them anymore if this is how they could be treated. By the way, I can go a bit further and get gravel from one of the trucking companies for half the cost.

resp.text: Michael, We are sorry about your experience at our store. We hope that you will give us another chance later down the road.

name: Benjamin Stout
text: Very very poor way of doing business! Today makes the second time this week that I have tried to purchase a large amount of rock from you and was not successful. I waited in line before you were open only for you to help others that came way after me first. I waited over 2 hours the other day and still was not helped. I will no longer do business with you and I will also no longer suggest you business to others. If you dont want the business close the location instead of doing business the way you are.

resp.text: Benjamin, We are sorry about your experience at our store. We hope that you will give us another chance later down the road.

name: Ewing Lawn Care
text: We have been using Woerner for many years and have always been satisfied with the quality of materials, as well as the superb customer service.  The employees are always friendly and give excellent advice on the products they sell.  I'm always impressed with how the employees are hustling to load materials for customers, as this is very rare to see these days!

name: Dante Piccini
text: This place has some great sod, I would highly recommend getting sod from them. Also any question about sod, pavers, insecticides, watering schedules, they are very friendly and helpful in answering any questions I had. Steven, Carla, and all the guys inside and those helping to load outside are very friendly and good people. I'm happy to do my business with them and will continue to do so knowing that their expertise and products are very good. Even if you are not sure about something, I would recommend going in person or calling them, they are very helpful. 5/5 for me.

name: david street
text: Always professional and courteous service - and very "veteran-friendly". Always ready answer any questions. I highly recommend them for any yard or gardening needs. Thanks to you all... Regards.

name: Scarlett Harrison
text: As a landscaper, this is the only place I will get my sod and landscape products! The quality is amazing! The staff is super friendly and extremely helpful! I’ve been a customer for over 15 years and counting! 😊

name: Nate Crabtree
text: Great staff, help is always helpful. Materials are top notch at a good price with great selection. Highly recommend!

resp.text: Thank you, Nate. Glad to help you.

name: Matt Jones
text: Great office staff. Materials are pretty good. I've gotten some rough looking sod here a few times but that's the only complaint. I go here alot.

resp.text: Thank you, Matt. We do try to do our best on quality control, so we apologize for any that has been not to your or our standards. See you again soon!

name: Sheila Vickery
text: We purchased over $7,000 of grass last March. We now have numerous weeds and crab grass instead of the centipede we paid for. Would not recommend them or ever use them again.

resp.text: Sheila, we do apologize. We do not have a warranty on our grass especially over a years time just because there are some many things that we do not have control over once it has left our field. Have you contacted our store? We would like to talk with you, Do you mind if we reach out to you?

name: Christina Carr
text: Great service.  Great product.   Always has what I need.  My go to place for all of my landscape needs.

resp.text: We are glad we are able to help you!

name: Ryan Ludvik
text: They are always super friendly, have great selections and prices for premium dog food, and though my dogs are both 80lbs of hugs and kisses, they're always accepting and don't mind. Anytime someone needs dog food or lawn items, I always suggest Woerner's!

name: Ross Hatcher
text: This is a really neat store if you're into landscaping.  I could easily spend enough money here to make my wife pretty angry.  I've bought sand and gravel here recently, and the prices seem very fair.  They also got me in and out pretty quickly.  On my last trip to buy gravel, the load got pretty heavy and made my trailer tires look pretty deflated.  The young guy who loaded it then had me follow him to get some complimentary air from their compressor to make sure I got home safely.  Great service!

name: kim nelson
text: Great Service and friendly staff. They were very knowledgeable about what products I needed for my lawn.

name: j Wayne
text: Our company Quality sod and lawn care has been using woernrs for over 20yrs always good service

name: Matthew Jenkins
text: I have purchased many loads of gravel, sand, and rock from them. They have always been friendly and helpful and the price is right. I have been to many places like this around the area and Woerner beats them all in service, selection, and price.

name: Deeanna Smith
text: I picked up "clean long leaf straw" for a new customer. Well, that was a lie. Loads of trash and straw that was old and very brittle. I even took pictures. Called to speak to mgr. He was very rude. He said he sold 1500 bales a week and hadn't had a complaint. I will never go there again. Lowes has better pinestraw.

resp.text: Hey Deanna, we are sorry to hear the experience and purchase was not acceptable. We will follow up and find a resolution soon.

name: John McCabe
text: I frequent this store for sod and pinestraw mostly.  They always have better service and superior products than their competitors.

name: David Vincent
text: Everyone I come in they are very helpful and polite

name: Bill Huber
text: I buy some sod and dyed pine straw here several times per year.  They always have what I need and the staff is always friendly and helpful.

name: Chase Nelson
text: The absolute worst turf supplier in the area.  I purchased a pallet of grass a while back. After it was picked up and delivered to my home where it was laid in the area prepared, I discovered that more than half the grass was already dead and falling apart. This was the worst choice!

resp.text: Chase, we do apologize for any previous experiences you have had with us. We are under new management at this location. We hope that you will give us another chance in the future to change your mind about our business. And again we are sincerely apologetic.

name: Scott Griffith
text: Purchased a load of pea gravel. The service was prompt, professional, and the price was reasonable.

name: Half Time
text: Great staff

name: Shay Rivers
text: Wow! I love this place!

name: Hunter Walker
text: Great place

name: Matthew Blackmon
text: Great service

name: David Pham
text:
(Translated by Google) It sells all kinds of building stones, people can come here to choose from the price is very good better than homedepot and low here. You may get a discount when you buy a lot. 👌👌👌

(Original)
Nơi đây bán tất cả các loại đá xây dựng mọi người có thể đến đây lựa chọn thoả mái giá cả rất tốt tốt hơn homedepot và low tại đây. Có thể bạn sẽ được giảm giá khi mua nhiều. 👌👌👌

resp.text: Thank you for your review! We are glad you had a great experience and hope you return to visit us again soon!

name: Betty Brooks
text: Everyone has always been extremely friendly & professional. The drivers are highly skilled and very helpful. I have used M&M for several jobs from tearing down a house, clearing and hauling off debris, gravel and sand for driveways and mulch. Pricing is always very fair. I highly recommend this company to anyone in Auburn/Opelika and surrounding area for and sand, rock, gravel , demo work and more. Local company that has been around forever.

name: Keith Henderson
text: Very  friendly  staff  takes care of all  your  needs  recommend them for  all your projects 👍

resp.text: Keith, Thank you so much for taking the time to leave an excellent rating. We really appreciate your business. Please let us know what we can do for you in the future.

name: geoff goodman
text: They were very helpful and patient even though we weren't experienced with gravel. Very affordable too.

resp.text: Geoff, Thank you so much for this 5-star review. We really appreciate you being a customer and helping to share the word about us. We’re here for you anytime.

name: Ray Blackwell
text:
Had a chance to meet up with the owner and his great people who work with in the company, I am impressed with the operation of this company. Very relaxed and happy personal.
Call them for all your hauling and construction needs.

resp.text: Wow Ray, Thanks very much for your positive words, we really appreciate the time you took to write such a detailed review! ...

name: Thomas Martin
text: Awesome people to work with.

resp.text: Thanks for the awesome review, Thomas! We work hard to meet expectations like yours, and we’re happy to hear we hit the mark for you. Come back and see us soon.

name: john brinkerhoff
text: I ordered #4 River Rock last week,  and they didn't disappoint.  On time and reasonably priced!

name: MARK WOODHAM
text: They were very nice people.

resp.text: Thanks Mark for the kind words! I will be sure and share with our team.

name: Thomas A Wingate
text:
Truck 169 bad truck driver made an illegal pass. He got in the left turn lane and passed me and  continued on al 29n running 15 to 220 mph over the speed limit.  Watch this guys,  he will hit someone. Called the company.
They really didn't care.

name: Spencer Marshall
text: Best of the best!

resp.text: Thanks Spenser for sharing your rating with us and the community.

name: M Stevens
text: Great selection of bulk wood chips, gravel, fill dirt etc.

name: Parker Brightwell
text: awesome company. Very nice and go out of there way to make sure customer is happy. Will definitely do business with them again.

name: Hunter Knutson
text: I ended up paying 90 dollars for 5 yards of mulch. I am only able to fit about 2 yards in my truck which I did not know at the time but they charged me for the full 5 yards anyway. They wouldn't let me come back to get the rest of the 5 yards I paid for because it "cost money to start the loader up". Even with two bed loads I'd still be paying for 1 yard that I didn't even get so the cost to start the loader up should not be an issue. Not a good company to work with and they are rude to their customers. Definitely not going to give them any more of my business. They cheated me out 3 yards worth of mulch. They assume that because I am young that I do not know what I am talking about. Little do they know that I work with a lot of landscapers in the area. I am surprised they are still in business.

name: Brett Mcanally
text: Business has never been better. We at M & M strive to treat every customer fair and with respect. Hope to see you soon for your hauling needs and more.

name: mike green
text: Purchased several loads of gravel and had them delivered to my business. They were on time and the driver done a great job dumping where he was instructed.

resp.text: We love to hear from our happy customers. Thank you for leaving this awesome comment and we can’t wait to help you with whatever you may need next.

name: Scott Thomas
text: They got dirt.  Woohoo!

name: Eric Matthews
text: Great job

name: Scott Bishop
text: Ok.

resp.text:
Scott,

We pride ourselves on our customer service so we hate to hear you had just an ok experience with us. We welcome feedback from customers so we can make sure we are delivering excellent customer service at all times. Please give us a call at 334-887-3976 and ask for either Lorie or Brett. We look forward to hearing from you.

name: Roman Duprel
text: Good people

name: Betsey Grubbs
text: Good people!

name: Larry Gill
text: Good people

name: BamaEsco334
text: Crooks

name: Jeff Ott
text:
Worst experience I've had with this company. One lie after a another 3 hr  late said they would spread it
I got 4 piles of it. I was told it would be 26 1/2 ton it was 26, haft ton short I will never use this company again.

name: Mollie Newsome
text: I like this place because it's a garden Center! I love to be around growing things. The staff are very helpful and seem to know what they're talking about.

name: Arlene Dean
text:
We have shopped here several times & have found what we needed nearly every time. Most recently a gentleman helped us in the plumbing department & knew more about the issue we were having than the so called plumber we hired (that came to our home twice & still didn't fix the issue).
The water refill tube the Home Depot employee opened for us to test, and sold to us, fit perfectly & solved our problem.
We also purchased our holiday tree & holiday greenery at this location.  Nick, the helpful young man that trimmed & wrapped the tree for us, did a perfect job. We have lived in a variety of cities and states and this is hands down our favorite Home Depot location.

name: Scamuel Jones
text: This place is a total loser.  I could not find two common plants I was looking for in the lawn & garden.  Then I clicked to "chat" and was told I was #1 in the queue and then no one ever chatted!  I would suggest not even wasting your time at Home Depot for anything.  Try Lowe's or local nurseries, since these people totally IGNORE their customers!

name: Mason
text: Helpful staff but they often don't have what I'm looking for.

name: Amy Clement
text:
I live just down the street from this Home Depot and EVERY time I go into this store, I can never find anyone to help me.  It looks like a ghost town at the front of the store.  Are you under staffing this store, or are the employees hiding in the back?  I will say that I mostly come to this store after 5pm usually.

I thought it was important to let you know this because if things do not improve, I will just go across the street to Lowe's where they have always been more than happy to help me.  Your store is my neighborhood store, and I want to see you succeed and not go under because of poor management decisions with either hiring bad employees or not paying your staff enough to care about the customers.

Thanks!

name: T Denton
text: I purchased garden soil for blueberry plants.

name: Monika Askew
text: Had to load 40 bags of mulch by myself.  I told the cashier I would need help but he didn't call anyone.  Meanwhile, there were 2 guys loading pine straw and didn't offer to help.

name: Timothy Taylor
text: My wife and I were looking for something to replace the old plastic edging around our flower beds and some fresh soil to work into the beds. No problems there. We got ready to check out, and Home Depot decided to do their best Walmart impression...9 or 10 customers waiting to check out, only 1 register open.😖  After about 12-15 minutes in line, the second register finally opened.

name: Diane Lewis
text: Love the garden center, beautiful flowers they had a sale on potting soil, good deal but no one there to help I have a bad hand and needed help with soil but couldn't find any one

name: Bobby Gilliland
text: very good in every way.

name: Bryan McElroy
text: Home and garden building supplies tools.

name: Ultreya Park
text: Fantastic experience. Super helpful guy (and beautiful resident black cat) who exchanged, without problem, a plant I bought a few weeks ago that perished. Much more room than some garden centers, making it easy to get around with wide aisles. Lots of variety in annuals and perrenial plants and all the rest, pots, rocks, soil and anything for outside. Wish they would keep the garden center gates open when the store is open for that last hour shopping errand.

name: Jared Persons
text:
Just purchased a big grille!!!!
Home depot employee from lighting DEPT , stopped what he was doing to help me wheel grille to register and then outside to my trailer to help load it up.
He could of easily sent me on a wild goose chase to find someone in the lawn and garden section, but he didn't.....That's hard to find these days in retail stores...

name: Bit Bucket
text: It was good for us today! Because of the freezing weather, herbs were knocked down to 3 bucks. Some of them were not hurt.

name: lovesickforone
text: Loved thier garden dpt.! Great plants...good variety

name: Christopher Brown
text: Drove from Bayou la Batre they had only part of what I needed but they just out. Big selling I belive

name: Judith Word
text: The garden department staff & all employees and management here have been very friendly and helpful

name: Russell Pilling
text: I live in Theodore and went to Lowe's first waited forty minutes to be told by the man in lawn and garden he would be there soon waiting for another fifteen minutes went to Home Depot got a riding mower and gone in fifteen minutes that's faster than Jimmy Johnson LOLOL

name: hector macias
text: ,,love shopping here everytime a make a delivery,,
